1370: Costan moved to Davids hof.B.2 after marriage.
Got married to Ghoudekinen at age 19 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Ghoudekinen, Wendelmodis, at age 19.
1371: Had a daughter with Ghoudekinen, Heylewigis, at age 20.
1372: Had a daughter with Ghoudekinen, Soeten, at age 21.

1377: Had a daughter with Ghoudekinen, Ghoudekinen, at age 26.
1380: Lost daughter Marcibilia when Marcibilia was 0 years old.
Ghoudekinen gave birth to their stillborn daughter Marcibilia in 1380.
1381: Had a son with Ghoudekinen, Eustacius, at age 30.
